thread.title: Alabama coach Nick Saban helped prospects with Wonderlic test, website reports
thread.title_full: Alabama coach Nick Saban helped prospects with Wonderlic test, website reports | NOLA.com

author: Jim Kleinpeter, NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune
title: Alabama coach Nick Saban helped prospects with Wonderlic test, website reports
text:
Alabama coach Nick Saban admitted to helping draft prospects score higher on the Wonderlic test when he was an NFL coach, SECountry.com reported Thursday .
Saban commented to fans on his radio show that, "I would actually take the test out, look at it, tutor the guy a little bit, alright, before he took it. Maybe lose a few minutes on the timing part of it, so he had a little extra time ... and they would do better."
The Wonderlic test is administered by the NFL at the February scouting combine. Saban also admitted the practice in a 2006 story in USA Today when he was coach of the Miami Dolphins.
